description: Detects inline Windows shell commands redirecting output via the ">" symbol to a suspicious location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate admin or third party scripts used for diagnostic collection might generate some false positives
name: Suspicious CMD Shell Output Redirect
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Cmd.Exe")) AND ((process.command_line.text:("*>\ \\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*>\ %APPDATA%\\*" OR "*>\ %TEMP%\\*" OR "*>\ %TMP%\\*" OR "*>\ %USERPROFILE%\\*" OR "*>\ C\:\\Temp\\*" OR "*>\ C\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*>\ C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR "*>\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*>%APPDATA%\\*" OR "*>%TEMP%\\*" OR "*>%TMP%\\*" OR "*>%USERPROFILE%\\*" OR "*>C\:\\Temp\\*" OR "*>C\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*>C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:("*\ >*" OR "*\">*" OR "*'>*") AND process.command_line.text:"*C\:\\Users\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\*"))))
